General.Name: Allied Supreme Corp
General.Description: Allied Supreme Corp. manufactures and sells fluoropolymer resins worldwide. It offers fluoropolymer materials, lining products, and coatings; customized products, such as injection molding products, overflow sink/tank, PTFE micro-powders, and PTFE compounds; and solutions for chemical system design and integration needs of IC/TFT-LCD, pharmaceutical, biochemical, petrochemical, and traditional chemical industries. Allied Supreme Corp. was founded in 1981 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.12, Ming-Tsu East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10461
